pkgmetadata.longdescription: Implementation of the Unsupervised Smooth Contour Line Detection for Images // An implementation of the Unsupervised Smooth Contour Detection algorithm for digital images as described in the paper: "Unsupervised Smooth Contour Detection" by Rafael Grompone von Gioi, and Gregory Randall (2016). The algorithm is explained at doi:10.5201/ipol.2016.175.
